VARAMAR
SHIPPING

Request Freight client login
VARAMAR is one of the biggest carriers of heavy and oversized cargo

VARAMAR, founded in 2009 as a carrier of breakbulk and heavy cargo, has today become a global carrier of all types of cargo, regardless of their size, shape, quantity or destination. VARAMAR can find the best way of shipping a cargo be it a 100 freight ton parcel or a contract with regular shipments of 80.000+ mt lot sizes.

12B+

Delivered packeges

Our chartering managers speak many languages, including English, German, Chinese, Hindi and Italian.
